column1: IF market_type is "bitcoin-up-or-down" OR "ethereum-up-or-down" THEN use 1-hour sizing
IF market_type is "btc-updown-15m" OR "eth-updown-15m" THEN use 15-minute sizing
IF UP_price >= 0.90 THEN DOWN_weight = 0 (stop trading DOWN)
IF DOWN_price >= 0.90 THEN UP_weight = 0 (stop trading UP)
Step 4: Apply tilt boost (if not blocked by step 3)
Step 5: Calculate inventory weights (if not blocked by step 3)
IF Final_UP_trade >= $0.01 THEN place UP order
IF Final_DOWN_trade >= $0.01 THEN place DOWN order
